PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-06402018-05-31,  ,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration of DEBORAH ANN GRACE MORRISH, full time member and Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office) for the period she is acting as Deputy Chairperson of the Refugee Appeal Division, effective January 18, 2018, until such time as a new Deputy Chairperson of the Refugee Appeal Division is designated.
AttachmentsAttachment
